items.sentence: Tom wants to learn boxing, but his mother thinks it\'s too dangerous.
Don\'t worry, Mom. He isn\'t particular about food. He eats anything.
I don\'t care how much you want it. I\'m not going to give it to you.
I don\'t know about you guys, but I\'m buying Tom a birthday present.
Boston is a great place to visit, but I wouldn\'t want to live there.
